tasks.name: Identify Ping Target
tasks.objective: Determine the specific target for the ping operation relevant to the repository.
actions: Consult with stakeholders to clarify the target for the ping operation.
acceptance: Target for the ping operation is clearly defined.
risks: Miscommunication may lead to selecting an incorrect target.
mitigations: Engage in discussions with multiple stakeholders to confirm the target.

tasks.name: Define Report Requirements
tasks.objective: Establish the format and details required for the repository report based on the ping operation results.
actions: Gather requirements from users regarding the report format and details.
Create a draft outline of the report based on gathered requirements.
acceptance: Report requirements are documented and approved by stakeholders.
risks: Insufficient details may lead to a report that does not meet user expectations.
mitigations: Iterate on the report draft with user feedback to ensure completeness.

notes: These tasks aim to clarify ambiguities regarding the ping target and report requirements before proceeding with the actual ping operation and report generation.
